containers.name: Hero Card (Workout Frame)
containers.notes: Parent container; rounded-rectangle child 68426:7273 has styling

containers.name: Main Activity Image
containers.notes: MCP get_metadata identifies as 'rounded-rectangle' but does not expose radius value; requires REST API or manual inspection

containers.name: Info Card Background (CTA Button)
containers.notes: CTA button background; radius not exposed via MCP

containers.name: Category Chip (Running Icon Container)
containers.notes: Extracted from get_code output: 'rounded-[16px]'; uniform corners

containers.name: Recommendation Card (Image Placeholder)
containers.notes: Extracted from get_code output: 'rounded-[20px]'; uniform corners; applied to both image and overlay gradient

containers.name: Highlight Overlay (Recommendation Card)
containers.notes: Matches parent image radius; gradient overlay

containers.name: Set Info Container
containers.notes: Extracted from get_code: 'rounded-[20px]'; inherits from parent card radius

containers.name: Header Icons (Search, Bell)
containers.notes: No border-radius class in get_code output; likely square or small radius (<4px) not rendered in Tailwind

containers.name: Bottom Navigation Bar
containers.notes: Instance node; component definition required for radius data

limitations: MCP get_code returns Tailwind classes (e.g., 'rounded-[16px]') for frames with auto-layout
rounded-rectangle nodes (68426:7273, 68426:7276, 68426:7323) do not include radius values in get_metadata
cornerSmoothing property not exposed via MCP API
independentCorners (per-corner radius) not detectable from Tailwind classes (uniform 'rounded-[Npx]')
Instance nodes (components) require parent component definition
recommendation:
Use Figma REST API GET /v1/files/:file_key/nodes?ids=... to retrieve:
- rectangleCornerRadii (array of 4 values for independent corners)
- cornerRadius (single value for uniform)
- cornerSmoothing (0-1 value)
